name: @mariomui/cans
description: Create a new server for easy prototype

scripts.prepub:patch: npm run acl:dev && npm run save:work:patch
scripts.save:work:patch: git add -A && git commit -m $(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && npm version patch
scripts.mversion: sh -c 'incarg=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && if [[ $incarg -eq "main" ]]; then npm version $0; else echo Please use main to version; fi;'
scripts.version: npm run acl && git add -A && git add .

author: mario mui
